revisions.*: Because "rvslots" was not specified, a legacy format has been used for the output. This format is deprecated, and in the future the new format will always be used.

[[Category:Atlas]]
[[Category:Dungeons]]
[[File:DestardDungeonEntranceImage.png|625px|right|]]
__TOC__
==Notes==
*Located south of [[Factions|Minax]] base, southeast of [[Skara Brae]] and northwest of [[Trinsic]]. 
*Receives the 50% Dungeon Skill Gain Bonus.
==Champion Spawn==
Beware adventurers, within this den of dragons [[Champion Spawns#Rikktor - Skull of Power|Rikktor]] guards his loot hoard! [[Champion Spawns#Rikktor - Skull of Power|Rikktor]] is one of the many [[Champion Spawns|Champions]] that inhabit the lands of Sosaria. 

==Dungeon Boss==
You may also encounter [[Dungeon_Bosses#Fafnir|Fafnir]] as well if you are truly unlucky! [[Dungeon_Bosses#Fafnir|Fafnir]] is one of the many [[Dungeon_Bosses|Dungeon Bosses]] that can be found in Sosaria.

==[[Paragons]]==
*drake - Level 1
*young dragon - Level 1
*shadow wyrm - Level 2
*efreet - Level 1
==[[Lockpicking|Locked Chests]]==
*3x Low Tier (crates, barrels, kegs) - Level 1(x3)
*2x High Tier (large wooden or metal chests) - Level 3 (x2)
= Level 1 =
[[File:Destard_1.png|right|]]
===Legend===
*1. Entrance
*2. Low Tier (crates, barrels, kegs) [[Lockpicking|Locked Chest]]
*3. Champion Spawn - [[Champion Spawns#Rikktor - Skull of Power|Rikktor]]
*4. Ankh
*5. Purple Moongate - Can only enter while dead, takes you to [[Despise]] Level 3.
*6. To Level 2
===Monsters===
*drake, pathaleo drake, dragon, wyvern, young dragon, giant serpent, greater dragon, elder dragon, murderer NPC, water elemental, dire wolf, efreet
===[[Paragons]]===
*drake, young dragon, efreet
===[[Lockpicking|Locked Chests]]===
*3x Low Tier (crates, barrels, kegs)
= Level 2 =
[[File:Destard_2.png|right|]]
===Monsters===
*gargoyle, wyvern, blazing gargoyle, dragon, shadow wyrm, evil mage NPC, daemon, skeleton
===[[Paragons]]===
*shadow wyrm
===[[Lockpicking|Locked Chests]]===
*None
= Level 3 =
[[File:Destard_3.png|right|]]
===Legend===
*1. From Level 2
*2. High Tier (large wooden or metal chests) [[Lockpicking|Locked Chest]]
*3. Portal to [[Deceit]] Level 4
*4. Portal to [[Terathan Keep]]

*giant serpent, fire elemental, elder dragon, ancient wyrm
